alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Upper Terrebonne; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 4:14PM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures in the upper 20s expected. For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures in the lower to mid 20s expected. * WHERE...Southshore and coastal portions of southeast Louisiana and southern Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 9 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. A hard freeze can possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
